articles.title: South Africa’s dispute with US escalates amid row over G20 handover event
articles.description: Trump press secretary accuses Cyril Ramaphosa of ‘running his mouth’ after US boycott of summit in Johannesburg

articles.title: Brazilian president will take fossil fuel phase-out plan to G20 summit
articles.description: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva says he is ready to fight for transition roadmap despite opposition from some states

articles.title: South Africa declares gender-based violence a national disaster amid G20 protests
articles.description: Women’s groups welcomed the announcement on the eve of the international leaders’ summit in Johannesburg

articles.title: Keir Starmer defends trip to South Africa for G20 summit as budget looms
articles.description: PM says he aims to secure investment to help deal with cost of living and shore up support for Ukraine

articles.title: Western leaders at G20 say US peace plan for Ukraine ‘will require work’
articles.description: European leaders say Washington’s proposal needs major changes, as Macron warns G20 risks losing relevance

articles.title: US in talks to attend G20 summit after initial boycott, South Africa says
articles.description: Cyril Ramaphosa says US has had ‘change of mind’ but does not confirm Trump’s attendance in Johannesburg

articles.title: US plan for Ukraine needs ‘additional work’, say Kyiv’s allies at G20 summit – as it happened
articles.description: The leaders of key European countries, as well as Canada and Japan, issue a joint statement on proposal for end of Russia-Ukraine war

articles.title: News live: Darwin hospital roof collapses as Tropical Cyclone Fina brings heavy rains; Australia signs G20 statement backing Paris Agreement
articles.description: Follow updates live

articles.title: Lavrov’s absence sparks speculation he has fallen from favour with Putin
articles.description: Veteran foreign minister missed key Kremlin meeting, and is not part of Russia’s G20 delegation

articles.title: G20 review – Viola Davis plays president in so-so action thriller
articles.description: The Oscar winner plays a soldier turned world leader forced to fight back in Amazon’s simple, serviceable star vehicle

articles.title: Trump Officials Are Policing Words and Foiling Deals at G20 Summit
articles.description: At the annual meeting of the world’s major economic powers, U.S. objections are blocking the usual policy statements, highlighting the president’s distaste for multilateralism — and compromise.

articles.title: White House Says South Africa’s President Is ‘Running His Mouth’
articles.description: The South African president suggested Washington had decided to participate in the summit, despite an earlier claim of a boycott.

articles.title: South Africans Seize on Global Summit to Air Their Nation’s Ills
articles.description: Johannesburg this weekend will host the first G20 meeting on African soil. Protesters are using the moment to draw attention to domestic problems.

articles.title: G20 Leaders Push Back on U.S. Peace Plan for Ukraine
articles.description: In a joint statement, the leaders reaffirmed their commitment to Ukraine, which faces the prospect of losing American support if it rejects the latest proposal.

articles.title: ‘G20’ Review: Viola Davis Plays an Action-Hero President
articles.description: Davis raises the bar on sheer brawniness in this action film where an American president has to fight Australian crypto-terrorists.

articles.title: Bessent to Skip G20 Finance Ministers Meeting in South Africa
articles.description: The Treasury secretary is the second top U.S. official not to attend the Group of 20 gatherings because of rising tension with South Africa over its land policies.

articles.title: Trump Will Host G20 Summit in 2026 at His Doral Resort
articles.description: President Trump faced withering bipartisan criticism in his first term for a similar idea that would have mixed foreign diplomacy with his personal business interests.

articles.title: As Trump Causes Global Upheaval, Some G20 Nations Rally to Fight Back
articles.description: The absence of Secretary of State Marco Rubio hung over the year’s first high-level meeting of the world’s largest economies, with diplomats fretting over turbulent times.

articles.title: What Could Happen at the Trump-Putin Summit, and a Game of Chicken Over Voting Maps
articles.description: Plus, your Friday news quiz.

articles.title: What Should a Woman President Wear?
articles.description: Season 3 of “The Diplomat” is here, complete with many, many pantsuits.
